prompts.frontCover:
Flat 2D illustration for a birthday card, minimalist and heartfelt style, solid cream-colored background.

Central illustration features a stylized, simplified cartoon version of Grandpa from the reference photo, sitting contentedly on a minimalist wooden stool. He is depicted in his grey turtleneck sweater and pants. He is holding a small, decorative Chinese opera mask in one hand, smiling gently. Seated on the floor at his feet is a cartoon version of Tong Tong from the reference photo, wearing the red sweater (with simple shapes instead of the original design). Tong Tong is looking up at Grandpa with a happy, adoring expression, offering him a large, stylized steamed crab on a simple white plate.

Floating gracefully around them are delicate, minimalist line drawings: a small fishing boat (sampan), a shrimp, and a fish, all rendered in a soft, elegant ink wash style. These elements are arranged artfully in the background space, creating a sense of a shared, cherished memory.

In the center of the card, positioned above the main illustration, the text "Happy Birthday, Grandpa" is written in a beautiful, flowing, dark brown handwritten cursive script.

The overall composition is clean, emotional, and centered, with plenty of negative space, evoking a tender, personal, and artistic feel.
